trans-unit.source: pyClamd is a python interface to Clamd (Clamav daemon).
trans-unit.target: pyClamd是Clamd(Clamav守护进程)的一个python接口。

trans-unit.source: pyClamd is a python interface to Clamd (Clamav daemon). By using pyClamd, you can add virus detection capabilities to your python software in an efficient and easy way. Instead of pyClamav which uses libclamav, pyClamd may be used by a closed source product.
trans-unit.target: pyClamd是Clamd(Clamav守护进程)的一个python接口。通过使用pyClamd,你可以以一种高效和简单的方式为你的python软件添加病毒检测功能。pyClamd可以代替使用libclamav的pyClamav,由一个闭源产品来使用。
